name: Lemon & Blueberry Cookies | BMW | DEVELOPED
description:
Recipe created for Developed during the "Beginner Mixer Week".
Find all the recipes searching "Developed" on ATF
author: NaCHeF

reviews.text: This is some serious good stuff. I was a little sceptical at first with the 1.5% INW biscuit, as we are so used to this around 0.5%, but I must say that the CAP Vanilla Custard really combats the dryness INW Biscuit usually has. So a very easy and tasty recipe the Developed boys has made here.
